english.segment1: From the moment you opened my eyes. I have seen the world in a different light. From the dawn to the setting sun. I am overwhelmed. By all that you have done
english.segment2: Chorus: Adore, adore, adore. Jesus I adore you, Yes I adore, Adore, adore, adore. Jesus, I adore you. And I lay my life before you, o lord
english.segment3: There's a union of two becoming one. Deep inside my heart. I know that I belong. You have given everything to me. The least that I can do. Is give it back to you
english.segment4: Bridge: And all I am and ever will be. Is for you, lord. And everything within me cries
english.segment5: Chorus: Adore, adore, adore. Jesus, I adore you, Yes I adore you. And I lay my life before you. Adore, adore, adore, adore, adore. Jesus, I adore you
english.segment6: And I lay my life before you. I long to love and adore you. I lay my life before you, o lord. I adore you
